attributes.action: Coronavirus - Allow NHS staff to park for free whilst on duty
attributes.additional_details: More and more staff are working flat out during this crisis. Making them pay for their parking whilst they do extra shifts as well as their usual is unacceptable
attributes.background:
NHS staff are currently working flat out during the coronavirus outbreak, allow them to park for free at hospitals and places of work.

Allow them to park for free whilst on duty, even when this coronavirus has passed.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
